channel.title: 525 dragonscape
channel.description:
ok im using the pur3zscape source, but when i try to load it in using dragonscape client it logs in but i cant move then it logs out, is there a clienti should be using? if so please link me to it, also when i load a diff source into dragonscape the piety button wont work, like it makes the noise but the circle does highlight it, and when i use ultimate str it hihglights it but then i cant click off it,
any help would be bomb.
